column4: am trying to get 8800 GT graphic card to be recognised in 7.10.  have run 'nvidia-glx-config enable' as root, but xorg.conf reports board as vesa & runs at 800x600.  my xorg.conf is at  http://pastebin.com/d736ad90
i noticed there were problems with the old nvidia driver so have installed NVidia binary X.Org driver ('new' driver)
none of the drivers in gutsy's repos support the 8800 GT
thx for pointing that out. off to follow up
